con.english: (Muttaqun) the pious, the righteous, God fearing
those who believed and did righteous deeds
the garden where Adam and his wife stayed
those who follow the guidance of Allah
those who disbelieve and belie the proofs of Allah

con.arabic: إنجاء بني إسرائيل من عذاب آل فرعون
con.english: salvation of the children of Israel from the persecution of the Pharaoh's folk
the rock which blew into 12 springs

con.arabic: المعتدين في السبت من بني إسرائيل
con.english: those who transgressed on the Sabbath

con.arabic: البقرة التي أمر بني إسرائيل بذبحها
con.english: the cow which the children of Israel were commanded to slaughter

con.arabic: القتيل من بني إسرائيل في قصة البقرة
con.english: the killed person in the story of the cow
description of Prophet Muhammad in Torah
those who distort the words of Allah

con.arabic: الذين يسعون في خراب المساجد ومنع الذكر فيها
con.english: who prevent the name of Allah from being mentioned in His mosques and strive toward their destruction
those who ascribe son to Allah

con.arabic: الذين يكتمون ما في التوراة والإنجيل مما بينه الله
con.english: those who hide the content of the bible
those who repent and correct themselves and make evident [what they concealed]
those who disbelieved and died as such
deities considered as equal to Allah
the person who resolves dispute between parties
polytheists who fight against the Muslims
prohibition of preventing divorced women to unite with her husband
those who give charity in the cause of Allah

con.arabic: تابوت بني إسرائيل الذي فيه التوراة
con.english: the chest of Israelite that had the Torah
a river between Jordan and Palestine

con.arabic: أربعة أنواع من الطير في قصة إبراهيم
con.english: four kinds of birds in the story of Abraham
those to who insists on sins
what a person conceal within himself
the second blow of the Horn
the first blow of the Horn
noble angels who record our deeds
those who give less than due
pure sealed wine in the paradise
Tasneem (favored drink from a spring in Paradise)
those who receive their record in their right hand
these who receive their records in their left hand
those who are headless of their prayer

con.arabic: مبغض النبي محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم

con.english: those on whom favor of Allah is bestowed
those on whom the anger of Allah has fallen
the village near the sea (in the story of Sabbath)
those who purchased this world exchanging the world hereafter

con.arabic: كل من ينفى الخير عن الآخرين
con.english: those who deny the virtue of others
the Arabs who are offspring of Ishmael
Abraham, Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob and the Descendants (the 12 tribes of Israel)
the followers and those who are been followed
those who believed and those who have migrated and fought in the cause of Allah
those who swear not to have sexual relation with their wives

con.arabic: الفدية التي تدفعها المرأة لطلب الطلاق
con.english: ransom money which wife pays for divorce
those who transgress the limits of Allah

con.arabic: الزوج الأول والمرأة المطلقة طلاقاً بائناً من زوج آخر
con.english: the first husband and the women been divorced three times from another husband

con.arabic: الذين خرجوا من أرضهم خشية الموت
con.english: those who escaped their land fearing death
spending in the cause of Allah
the nobles among children of Israel

con.arabic: شيخ كبير ذو عيال له بستان
con.english: an old person with small kids who owns a garden

con.arabic: الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات وأقاموا الصلاة وآتوا الزكاة
con.english: those who believe, does good, establish prayer and give zakat

con.arabic: الذين يكفرون بآيات الله ويقتلون النبيين بغير حقّ ويقتلون الذين يأمرون بالقسط من الناس
con.english: Those who disbelieve in the signs of Allah and kill the prophets without right and kill those who order justice from among the people
Muslims and the peoples of the book

con.arabic: اللذين يشترون بعهد الله وأيمانهم ثمناً قليلاً
con.english: those who exchange the covenant of Allah and their oaths for a small price
those who became divided and differed
believers among the peoples of the scripture
banu Salamah and banu Haritha [two branches of Ansar]
enforcement of Islamic army with Angels
those who desires the reward of this world
those who desires the reward of the Hereafter
people of Paradise and people of Hellfire
those who greedily withhold which Allah gave them
those who migrated for the sake of Allah
those who migrated and struggled for the sake of Allah
owners of the garden in chapter 68
the violent wind which destroyed Aad
waking up in the middle of the night
Wife of the Prophet Hafsa daughter of Omar
Hafsa and Ayesha (two wives of the Prophet)
wife of Noah and wife of Lot
Jews from the tribe of banu Nadhir
restored property from disbelievers without war
instructions and prohibitions of the Prophet
the believers after the companions of the Prophet
Jews of the bani Qainuqa tribe
Prophet Muhammad and the women who pleaded with him
the husband who does Thihar (a form of pre-Islamic divorce)
the wife of the Thihar husband
those who oppose Allah and his Messenger
those who believe and spend in the cause of Allah

con.arabic: سور لفصل المؤمنين من المنافقين يوم القيامة
con.english: a wall to separate believers from hypocrites on the day of Judgement
thrones for the people of Paradise
the forerunners among the people of the Paradise
a soul at the time of death
two paradise for those who are receive their books by their right hand
Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary
Peoples of Noah and Aad and Thamud
cities of the people of Lot
those who eat up the money of the orphan

con.arabic: الرجل الذي يموت وليس له والد ولا ولد
con.english: those who die without leaving behind parents or children
those who obey Allah and His messenger
those who are bound by oath
arbitrator to reconcile between conflicting couples
the stingy and those who show off
who claims himself to be pure
those who invent about Allah untruth
who is been cursed by Allah
companion of man among the angels
the two angels: driver and witness
factions among believers who fight each other
eating the flesh of ones own brother
those who pledged allegiance in Hudaibiah
who fulfills the pledge of Allah
who denies the pledge of Allah
the weak amongst Muslims in Makkah
riding objects from ship and animal
those who carry the Throne of Allah among the angels
a believing man from the folk of Pharaoh
who has doubt in the religion
those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah

con.arabic: العبد المملوك لشركاء كثيرين والعبد المملوك لشخص واحد
con.english: a slave having many masters and a slave having one master
those who are guided by Allah

con.arabic: كل ما على الأرض من أموال
con.english: all the wealth of this earth
attributing bounties of Allah to the self
the two disputing parties in the court of David

con.arabic: الخصم الذي له نعجة واحدة في قصة داود
con.english: the brother who has one sheep in the story of David
the brother who has 99 sheep in the story of David
those who were followers of the tyrants
those who are followed among the tyrants
the people of the town in sura Yasin

con.arabic: الرسل اللذين أرسلوا لأصحاب القرية في سورة يس
con.english: the messengers who were sent to the people of the town in sura yasin
those who harm Allah, his Prophet and the believers
the two persons who fought: Israelite and coptic
the Coptic in the story of the two fighting people

con.arabic: الرجل الذي من شيعة موسى في قصة الرجلان المقتتلان
con.english: the person from Moses's tribe in the story of the two fighting persons

con.arabic: موسى والرجل الذي من شيعته في قصة الرجلان المقتتلان
con.english: Moses and the person from his tribe in the story of the two fighting persons

con.arabic: الرجل الذي حذر موسى من مؤامرة قتله
con.english: the man who warned Moses about the conspiracy to kill him
waters of the city of Madyan

con.arabic: المرأتان في قصة ماء مدين مع موسى
con.english: the two ladies in the story of Maydan and Moses

con.arabic: أحد المرأتان في قصة موسى في ماء مدين
con.english: one of the two ladies in the story of Moses in Madyan

con.arabic: والد المرأتان في قصة موسى في مدين
con.english: the father of the two ladies in the story of Moses in Madyan
the letter of Solomon to Bilquees
the man who had knowledge from the Book
those who are thankful to Allah
the nine family heads of Thamoud
Pharaoh upbringing Moses at his childhood

con.arabic: المستضعفين من المؤمنين من قوم نوح
con.english: the weak believers among the people of Noah
punishment of the day of black cloud
man or woman who commit illegal sexual intercourse
woman who commit illegal sexual intercourse
those who accused Ayesha of adultery

con.arabic: عبد الله بن أبي بن سلول رئيس المنافقين
con.english: Abdullah ibn Ubai ibn Salool, the head of hypocrites

con.arabic: اللذين يحبون شيوع الفاحشة في المسلمين
con.english: those who like to spread immorality among the Muslims
return when permission was not granted
who looks for marriage to chaste himself
non-believer's request to return back to this world
those who's right deed's balance outweighs bad deeds
those who's bad deed's balance outweighs good deeds

con.arabic: من يدخل في الإسلام على شك
con.english: he who enters into Islam with doubt
he who is humiliated by Allah
who commits oppression in the Haram
those who honor sacred ordinances of Allah

con.arabic: من عاقب بمثل ما عوقب به
con.english: whoever responds [to injustice] with the equivalent
the largest idol of the tribe of Abraham
justice and balancing the need of parties
Zachariah and his son and wife
ornaments of the people of Pharaoh
calf of the children of Israel
those who became enchanted by the calf among the children of Israel

con.arabic: تراب من أثر حافر فرس جبريل
con.english: soil from the track of the horse of the angel Gabriel
those who turn away from the Quran
the angel who assembles mankind on the day of resurrection
he who intercedes on the Day of Judgement
he whom has been interceded for on the Day of Judgement

con.arabic: الشجرة التي أكل منها آدم وزوجته
con.english: the tree from which Adam and Eve ate

con.arabic: خلق مولود من إمرأة عاقر ورجل عجوز
con.english: creation of a child from a barren mother and old aged father
creation of a child without father
those who neglect of prayer and follow lusts
the devils and those who deny the hereafter
tribe of the people of the Cave
the Cave in the story of the people of cave
the dog of the people of the Cave

con.arabic: أهل مدينة أصحاب الكهف بعد قيامهم من النوم
con.english: residence of the city of the people of the cave after their awakening

con.arabic: الخائضون في أصحاب الكهف من أهل الكتاب
con.english: those who debated about the number of the people of the cave among the people of the Scripture

con.arabic: الرجلان في قصة أصحاب الجنتين في الكهف
con.english: the two men in the story of the people of the two Gardens in ch 18

con.arabic: الجنتان في قصة أصحاب الجنتين في سورة الكهف
المؤمن في قصة الجنتين في سورة الكهف
con.english: the believer among the two in the story of Garden in ch 18

con.arabic: الكافر في قصة الجنتين في سورة الكهف
con.english: the non-believer among the two in the story of Garden in ch 18

con.arabic: حديقة الكافر في قصة الجنتين في الكهف
con.english: garden of the non-believer in the story of gardens in ch 18

con.arabic: البحران في قصة موسى مع الخضر
con.english: the two seas in the story of Moses and Khidr in ch 18

con.arabic: الحوت في قصة موسى مع الخضر
con.english: the fish in the story of Moses with Khidr
the ship which Khidr has broken

con.arabic: القرية في قصة موسى مع الخضر
con.english: the village in the story of Moses with Khidr in ch 18

con.arabic: الجدار الذي أقامه الخضر و موسى
con.english: the wall which was mended by Khidr and Moses
parents of the child whom Khidr killed

con.arabic: الغلامان اليتيمان في قضة موسى مع الخضر
con.english: the two orphans in the story of Moses with Khidr in ch 18
the people who lived at the place of sun set
people who live at the place of sun rising

con.arabic: مكان ما بين الجبلين اللذين وصله ذو القرنين
con.english: the place between two mountains where dhul-quarnain reached

con.arabic: القوم الذين كانوا يقطنون ما بين السدين في قصة ذي القرنين
con.english: the people who lived between the two mountains in the story of Dhul-Qarnain in ch 18
the separating dam which was built by Dhul-Qarnain in ch 18

con.arabic: إفساد بني إسرائيل مرتين في بيت المقدس
con.english: the corruption of the children of Israel twice in Jerusalem
enemy of the children of Israel
the lifespan of a person in this world
those who do not believe in the hereafter
those staying behind from migration for the sake of allah

con.arabic: رجل أبكم لا يقدر على شيئ وهو كل على مولاه
con.english: dumb and unable to do a thing, while he is a burden to his guardian

con.arabic: رجل سليم الحواس ذو نفع للآخرين

con.english: he who is forced to disbelieve

con.arabic: من هم تحت تصرف الرجل مثل الذرية والخدم والدواب
con.english: the lord of dependents like children, servants and cattle
dwellings of the people of Lot and the people of Shuaib

con.arabic: الذين يؤمنون ببعض الكتاب ويكفرون ببعض
con.english: those who partially believe in Quran
those who exchanged favor of Allah with disbelief
the person who seeks water for travelers
wife of the vazir of Egypt
Joseph and the wife of the vazir
the two companions of Joseph inside the jail

con.arabic: صاحب يوسف في السجن الذي نجا
con.english: the jail companion of Joseph who was feed

con.arabic: صاحب يوسف في السجن الذي صلب
con.english: the jail companion of Joseph who was executed
King of Egypt at the time of Joseph

con.arabic: سبع سنوات الجدب في قصة يوسف
con.english: seven drought years in the story of Joseph
messenger of the King of Egypt in the story of Joseph

con.arabic: ثمن الميرة التي أتى بها إخوة يوسف
con.english: merchandize brought by the brothers of Joseph

con.arabic: حرس ملك مصر في قصة يوسف
con.english: guards of the King of Egypt in the story of Joseph

con.arabic: مكيال ملك مصر في قصة يوسف
con.english: Measure of the King in the story of Joseph
eldest among the brothers of Joseph
those who were saved with Noah on the ark
the son of Noah who was sank

con.arabic: نوح و ابنه الهالك في الطوفان

con.english: Prophet Hud and the believers saved with him
women of the tribe of Lot
residence of those destroyed by punishment
good tidings in the worldly life and in the Hereafter
those who do not give alms and keep money
postponing of restriction within sacred months
those with excuses among the bedouins
those who are excused from Jihad
followers of compaanions of the Prophet

con.arabic: الثلاثة اللذين خلفوا عن قبول التوبة
con.english: the three who stayed behind Jihad but were forgiven
the mosque which the hypocrite took for causing harm
the caravan or the fight (battle of Badr)
the believers who did not migrate
people of the elevation on the partition between Paradise and Hellfire

con.arabic: المستضعفين من المؤمنين من قوم صالح
con.english: weak and oppressed believers from the tribe of Salih

con.arabic: الجبل الذي تجلي الله فيه لموسى
con.english: the mountain on which Allah appeared to Moses

con.arabic: السبعين من بني اسرائيل اللذين اختارهم موسى
con.english: the seventy among Israelite whom Moses chose

con.arabic: الساكتين عن المنكر في قصة أصحاب السبت
con.english: those who kept silent upon witnessing evil in the story of sabbath
those who opposed those who violated Sabbath
Jew Rabbis who do not follow Torah
the most beautiful names of Allah
those who practice deviation in the names of Allah
non-believers and their allies among satan
chaste women among the people of the Book
inhabitants of Jerusalem among the amalikes

con.arabic: الرجلان من بني إسرائيل كانا مؤيدين لقتال العماليق
con.english: two persons among the followers of Moses encouraged others to enter Jerusalem
two sons of Adam: Abil and Cain

con.arabic: المحاربين لله ورسوله والمفسدين في الأرض
con.english: who rage war against Allah and prophet and do mischief on earth

con.arabic: من لم يحكم بما أنزل الله
con.english: those who do not rule by the commands of Allah
those who befriend Jews and Christians
intoxicants, gambling, [sacrificing on] stone alters [to other than Allah ], and divining arrows
penalty of hunting while wearing Ihram
who hunts in the state of Ihram

con.arabic: شاهدان على الوصية من أولياء الميت
con.english: two witness on the death will among the kins of the deceased
table full of food from heaven
considering Jesus and his mother as god
